name: Battle for the Estranged Planet
description:
CONTROLS: left mouse button to fire at enemies, right mouse button to drag ammo to the player, or to drag asteroids around, R to restart at any time

This is the submission between https://cashwarrior1.itch.io/ and I for the GMTK game jam 2021, it fits the theme of "Joined together" because you gotta join ammo together to the player ship, it may seem as pushing it but yeah 

Check the game out on Newgrounds as well: Battle for the Estranged Planet (newgrounds.com)

Tweet your high scores out to me on twitter:  (1) Vulty is game jamin (@Vulty_doodles) / Twitter

Check out the composer here:

https://twitter.com/cashwarior1

https://nmatthiash.bandcamp.com/
